info.titleen: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour.
info.descko: 엄마의 생일선물을 고민하는 남자친구를 위해 여자친구가 제안한 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Luke got his head stuck in the banister again.
words: 움직일 수 없는[꼼짝 못하는], 갇힌, 들러붙다

sentense.en: I got it. Where’s the baby oil?
I was out of control growing up.
sentense.ko: 난 어릴 때, 완전 통제 불능이었어요.

sentense.en: I just don’t want my kids to make the same bad mistakes I made.
sentense.ko: 제 아이들만큼은 저랑 같은 실수를 안 했으면 해요

sentense.en: If Haley never wakes up on a beach in Florida, half-naked,
sentense.ko: 헤일리가 플로리다 해변에서 반쯤 벗은 채 (절대) 깨어나지 않는다면,
